clusterList.phrase: the challenge for the movies is that politics have been so entertaining all year long that if a movie isn't good it will pale by comparison
the difficulty w faces is that george bush isn't running this year and a lot of voters based on the polls have written him off in a way he'll be a fading figure in october when this movie comes out
this film is about how after the election we're going to have to pick up the pieces and have to clean up the mess that bush made and how that mess affects the rest of the world
